overview: An American flyer who joined the RAF before his country was in the war is recovering from a leg injury in Jerusalem. Through an English friend he meets a quiet Jewish girl whose close-knit family originally came from Spain. The two are attracted to each other but she is convinced their diverse backgrounds mean it could never work.
tagline: In a time and a world of impossible love, he would accept nothing less than everything.
title: Every Time We Say Goodbye
